name: massmulti Advanced Web Interface
short_description: mmAWI is a new CMS lib which aims to simplify the process of : creating websites + groups of users + content tree (nodes) + access control lists + design themes. 'Data Types Modules' -DTM- will be used to fill each Node. (Apache/Php & pgSQL required)
